story_info.customer_name: C.H. Robinson overcomes decades-old barriers to automate the logistics industry using Azure AI

enhanced_classification.summary: C.H. Robinson implemented Azure AI solutions to automate processing of thousands of daily customer email requests. The company used Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI to build generative AI tools that automated email processing, reducing response times from hours to seconds and improving employee productivity.
enhanced_classification.problem_statement: The company needed to efficiently process tens of thousands of daily customer email requests without sacrificing personalized service, which previously required manual handling and caused delays.
enhanced_classification.solution_description: Implemented Azure-based generative AI solutions to automate email classification, information extraction, and request fulfillment across multiple stages of the shipping process, including price quotes and shipment orders.

business_outcomes.description: Reduced email price quote response time from hours to average of 32 seconds
On pace to achieve 15% increase in productivity for the year
Delivered over half a million price quotes using generative AI

enhanced_classification.key_quote: Incorporating Azure AI in our tech has helped put us on pace to achieve another 15% increase in productivity this year, creating happier customers, from one-truck shippers to some of the largest companies in the world.
enhanced_classification.date_reasoning: Explicit publish date provided in article
